### Syllabus

Welcome to course website for Sta-330 (cross-listed as Mat-330), Applied Data Science!  On this page you can information on the course, starting with the syllabus linked below:

- [Click here](syllabus395s20.html) to view the course syllabus

### Materials

In this section you'll find materials used at various stages in the course. Several of these with persist throughout the semester (recurrent materials), while a few others will be discussed during the first two weeks.

**Recurrent materials**:

- Guidelines for project briefing presentations
- Guidelines for advisory critiques and feedback
- Guidelines for goal setting and strategic planning

**Other materials**:

- Icebreaker instructions
- Data ethics principles
    - - Project/client descriptions
- Data science life cycles
    - Dissecting a finished project
    - Mapping out a new project
- Project management
    - Planning client interactions
    - Coordination and delegation
- Best practices in goal setting

### Assignments

- Data ethics inventory
    - Due date: Friday 1/27 at 11:59pm
- Project preference reflection
   - Due date: Friday 2/3 at 11:59pm
- Peer assessment reflection #1
- Peer assessment reflection #2
- Peer assessment reflection #3
- Adviser take-over report
- Final products
